sqlMap.statement:
SELECT APPLICATION_NUM,REPORTKEY,RECEIPTKEY,RECEIPT_TYPE_CD,ERR_SEQNO,ERR_FILENAME,ERR_LOCATION,ERRS FROM V07_RECEIPT WHERE 1>0
APPLICATION_NUM = #application_num#
REPORTKEY = #reportkey#
RECEIPTKEY = #receiptkey#
RECEIPT_TYPE_CD = #receipt_type_cd#
ERR_SEQNO = #err_seqno#
ORDER BY #APPLICATION_NUM#,#ERR_SEQNO# desc

INSERT INTO T07_REPORT_CASE (REPORTKEY,APPLICATION_NUM,LAST_APPLICATION_NUM,CREATE_DT,MSGKEY,RECEIPTKEY) VALUES (#reportkey#,#application_num#,#last_application_num#,#create_dt#,#msgkey#,#receiptkey#)

SELECT RECEIPTKEY,RECEIPT_TYPE_CD,PACKETKEY,RECEIPT_FILE,RECEIPT_FILEPATH,CREATE_DT,PBC_CRT_DT FROM T07_RECEIPT WHERE 1>0
RECEIPTKEY = #receiptkey#
RECEIPT_TYPE_CD = #receipt_type_cd#
CREATE_DT >= #create_dt_start:DATE# AND CREATE_DT< #create_dt_end:DATE#
PBC_CRT_DT >= #pbc_crt_dt_start:DATE# AND PBC_CRT_DT<= #pbc_crt_dt_end:DATE#
receipt_file like #receipt_file#
ORDER BY $ordername$ desc

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T07_RECEIPT
RECEIPTKEY = #receiptkey#
RECEIPT_TYPE_CD = #receipt_type_cd#
receipt_file like #receipt_file#
CREATE_DT >= #create_dt_start:DATE# AND CREATE_DT< #create_dt_end:DATE#
PBC_CRT_DT >= #pbc_crt_dt_start:DATE# AND PBC_CRT_DT<= #pbc_crt_dt_end:DATE#

SELECT RECEIPTKEY,RECEIPT_TYPE_CD,PACKETKEY,RECEIPT_FILE,RECEIPT_FILEPATH,CREATE_DT FROM T07_RECEIPT WHERE 1>0
RECEIPTKEY = #receiptkey#
RECEIPT_FILE = #receipt_file#

SELECT MSGKEY,REPORTKEY,MSG_TYPE_CD,PACKETKEY,REPORT_TYPE_CD,REPORTORGANKEY,SENDDATE_DT,SENDDATE_CH, BATCH_SEQ,MSG_SEQ,MSG_FILE,MSG_FILEPATH,MSG_ORIG_FILE,MSG_ORIG_FILEPATH,ORIG_MSGKEY,ATTACH_FILE, ATTACH_FILEPAT,MSG_STATUS_CD,CREATE_DT FROM T07_MSG WHERE MSG_FILE=#value# AND MSG_STATUS_CD='2'
INSERT INTO T07_FDCF (RECEIPTKEY,RECEIPT_TYPE_CD,SFID,ERTN) VALUES (#receiptkey#, #receipt_type_cd#, #sfid#,#ertn#)
INSERT INTO T07_FDCF_FCER (RECEIPTKEY,ERFL_SEQNO,FCER_SEQNO,ERLC,ERRS) VALUES (#receiptkey#,1,#fcer_seqno#, #erlc#,#errs#)
UPDATE T07_MSG SET MSG_STATUS_CD=#msg_status_cd#,RECEIPT_FILE=#receipt_file# WHERE MSGKEY=#msgkey#
SELECT CRCD FROM T07_NBH_HTCR T WHERE T.REPORTKEY = #reportkey# AND T.CATI_SEQNO = #cati_seqno# AND T.HTCR_SEQNO = #htcr_seqno#

UPDATE T07_NBH_TSDT T SET VALIDATE_IND = '0',T.ERRORS_TYPE = #error_type#,T.PBC_CRT_DT=#pbc_crt_dt# WHERE T.REPORTKEY =#reportkey# AND T.CATI_SEQNO =#cati_seqno# AND T.CRCD = #crcd# AND T.TSDT_SEQNO=#tsdt_seqno#
UPDATE T07_NBH_CTIF T SET T.VALIDATE_IND = '0',T.ERRORS_TYPE = #error_type#,T.PBC_CRT_DT=#pbc_crt_dt# WHERE T.REPORTKEY = #reportkey# AND T.CATI_SEQNO = #cati_seqno#
UPDATE T07_IBH_TSDT T SET T.VALIDATE_IND = '0' WHERE T.REPORTKEY = #reportkey# AND T.TSDT_SEQNO = #tsdt_seqno#
UPDATE T07_NBS_RPDI T SET T.VALIDATE_IND = '0',T.ERRORS_TYPE = #error_type#,T.PBC_CRT_DT=#pbc_crt_dt# WHERE T.REPORTKEY = #reportkey# AND T.RPDI_SEQNO = #rpdi_seqno#
UPDATE T07_NBS_CTIF T SET T.VALIDATE_IND = '0',T.ERRORS_TYPE = #error_type#,T.PBC_CRT_DT=#pbc_crt_dt# WHERE T.REPORTKEY =#reportkey# AND T.CTIF_SEQNO = #ctif_seqno#
UPDATE T07_NBS_ATIF T SET T.VALIDATE_IND = '0',T.ERRORS_TYPE = #error_type# ,T.PBC_CRT_DT=#pbc_crt_dt# WHERE T.REPORTKEY = #reportkey# AND T.CTIF_SEQNO = #ctif_seqno# AND T.ATIF_SEQNO = #atif_seqno#

UPDATE T07_REPORT SET REPORT_STATUS_CD=#report_status_cd#
PBC_MSG_TYPE_CD=#pbc_msg_type_cd#
ORIG_APPLICATION_NUM=#orig_application_num#
VALIDATE_IND=#validate_ind#
INVALID_DT=#invalid_dt#
RESEND_IND=#resend_ind#
WHERE REPORTKEY=#reportkey#
INSERT INTO T07_08_FDRC_BH (RECEIPTKEY, RECEIPT_TYPE_CD, SFID, RCTN) VALUES (#receiptkey#, #receipt_type_cd#, #sfid#, #rctn#)
INSERT INTO T07_IBH_RBIF (REPORTKEY,RINM,RICD,IRDT,TSTN,VALIDATE_IND) VALUES (#reportkey#,#rinm#,#ricd#,#irdt#,$tstn$,#validate_ind#)

INSERT INTO T07_IBH_TSDT (REPORTKEY,TSDT_SEQNO,OCNM,OTDT,OTCD,OTIC,FINN,FIRC,RLTP,FICT,FINC,CATP,CTAC,TBNM,TBIT,TBID,TBNT,TSTM,TICD,TSTP,TSCT,TSDR,TDRC,TRCD,CRPP,CRTP,CRAT,CFIN,CFCT,CFIC,TCNM,TCIT,TCID,TCAT,TCAC,VALIDATE_IND,PARTY_CLASS_CD,CURR_CD,ERRORS_TYPE,PBC_CRT_DT,ORGANKEY) VALUES (#reportkey#,#tsdt_seqno#,#ocnm#,#otdt#,#otcd#,#otic#,#finn#,#firc#,#rltp#,#fict#,#finc#,#catp#,#ctac#,#tbnm#,#tbit#,#tbid#,#tbnt#,#tstm#,#ticd#,#tstp#,#tsct#,#tsdr#,#tdrc#,#trcd#,#crpp#,#crtp#,#crat#,#cfin#,#cfct#,#cfic#,#tcnm#,#tcit#,#tcid#,#tcat#,#tcac#,#validate_ind#,#party_class_cd#,#curr_cd#,#errors_type#,#pbc_crt_dt#,#organkey#)
INSERT INTO T07_08_FDRC_BH_FCRC (RECEIPTKEY, FCRC_SEQNO, OCNM, OTDT, OTCD, OTIC) VALUES (#receiptkey#, #fcrc_seqno#, #ocnm#, #otdt#, #otcd#, #otic#)
INSERT INTO T07_08_FDRC_BH_FCRC_RCIF (RECEIPTKEY, FCRC_SEQNO, RCIF_SEQNO, RCLC, RCSG) VALUES (#receiptkey#, #fcrc_seqno#, #rcif_seqno#, #rclc#, #rcsg#)

SELECT A.REPORTKEY, B.CSNM OCNM,A.CRCD OTCD,A.TICD OTIC, A.FINN,A.FIRC,A.RLTP,A.FICT,A.FINC,A.CATP,A.CTAC,A.TBNM,A.TBIT,A.TBID,A.TBNT,A.TSTM, A.TICD,A.TSTP,A.TSCT,A.TSDR,A.TDRC,A.TRCD,A.CRPP,A.CRTP,A.CRAT,A.CFIN,A.CFCT,A.CFIC, A.TCNM,A.TCIT,A.TCID,A.TCAT,A.TCAC,A.VALIDATE_IND,A.PARTY_CLASS_CD,A.CURR_CD,A.ORGANKEY FROM T07_NBH_TSDT A,T07_NBH_CTIF B WHERE A.REPORTKEY=B.REPORTKEY AND A.CATI_SEQNO=B.CATI_SEQNO AND A.REPORTKEY = #reportkey# AND TICD = #ticd# AND CRCD=#crcd#
INSERT INTO T07_08_FDRC_BS (RECEIPTKEY,SFID,RCTN) VALUES (#receiptkey#,#sfid#,#rctn#)
INSERT INTO T07_08_FDRC_BS_FCRC (RECEIPTKEY,FCRC_SEQNO,RCLC,RCSG) VALUES (#receiptkey#,#fcrc_seqno#,#rclc#,#rcsg#)
SELECT B.ORGANKEY FROM T07_NBS_RPDI A,T47_TRANSACTION_UC B WHERE REPORTKEY = #reportkey# AND RPDI_SEQNO = #rpdi_seqno# AND A.TICD = B.TRANSACTIONKEY
SELECT ORGANKEY FROM T07_FDRC_BS_RPDI_COUNT_MID WHERE ORGANKEY = #organkey# AND STATISTIC_DT = #pbc_crt_dt#
UPDATE T07_FDRC_BS_RPDI_COUNT_MID SET RPDI_COUNT = #rpdi_count# WHERE ORGANKEY = #organkey# AND STATISTIC_DT = #pbc_crt_dt#

SELECT MSGKEY,REPORTKEY,MSG_TYPE_CD,PACKETKEY,REPORT_TYPE_CD,REPORTORGANKEY,SENDDATE_DT,SENDDATE_CH, BATCH_SEQ,MSG_SEQ,MSG_FILE,MSG_FILEPATH,MSG_ORIG_FILE,MSG_ORIG_FILEPATH,ORIG_MSGKEY,ATTACH_FILE, ATTACH_FILEPAT,MSG_STATUS_CD,CREATE_DT FROM T07_MSG WHERE MSG_FILE=#msg_file# AND (RECEIPT_FILE!=#receipt_file# or RECEIPT_FILE is null) AND MSG_STATUS_CD='2'

SELECT T1.APPLICATION_NUM,T1.REPORTKEY,T0.RECEIPTKEY,T0.RECEIPT_TYPE_CD,T2.MSG_FILE MSGFILE, T3.RCLC ERR_LOCATION,T3.RCSG ERRS FROM T07_RECEIPT T0, T07_REPORT T1, T07_MSG T2,T07_08_FDRC_BH_FCRC_RCIF T3 WHERE T1.REPORTKEY = T2.REPORTKEY AND T0.MSGKEY = T2.MSGKEY AND T0.RECEIPTKEY = T3.receiptkey and t0.receiptkey=#receiptkey#

SELECT T1.APPLICATION_NUM,T1.REPORTKEY,T0.RECEIPTKEY,T0.RECEIPT_TYPE_CD,T2.MSG_FILE MSGFILE, T3.RCLC ERR_LOCATION,T3.RCSG ERRS FROM T07_RECEIPT T0, T07_REPORT T1, T07_MSG T2,T07_08_FDRC_BS_FCRC T3 WHERE T1.REPORTKEY = T2.REPORTKEY AND T0.MSGKEY = T2.MSGKEY AND T0.RECEIPTKEY = T3.RECEIPTKEY AND T0.RECEIPTKEY=#receiptkey#

SELECT T1.APPLICATION_NUM,T1.REPORTKEY,T0.RECEIPTKEY,T0.RECEIPT_TYPE_CD,T2.MSG_FILE MSGFILE, T3.ERLC ERR_LOCATION,T3.ERRS ERRS FROM T07_RECEIPT T0, T07_REPORT T1, T07_MSG T2,T07_FDCF_FCER T3 WHERE T1.REPORTKEY = T2.REPORTKEY AND T0.MSGKEY = T2.MSGKEY AND T0.RECEIPTKEY = T3.RECEIPTKEY AND T0.RECEIPTKEY=#receiptkey#
update t07_packet a set a.packet_status_cd='5' where exists(select 'x' from t07_msg b where b.packetkey=a.packetkey and b.msg_status_cd='3') and a.packet_status_cd='3'
